page.title: 13The Supernatural in Norden
page.content: In our area we have heard several tales about ghosts but the most interesting is a ghost called the Grey Lady, Who is believed to haunt the Manor Court in Norden. Before the Manor became a pub it was a hospital. The Grey Lady was a nurse there. Some people say that the Grey Lady was beheaded and others say she caught a disease from one of the patients and died. Almost everyone agrees that she killed patients in the old hospital. We have asked people questions but some seem reluctant to answer them. Just who is the Grey Lady ? We have also heard other tales concerning Greenbooth ( a village drowned under a reservoir ) and St. Paul's church, as well as the old Riviera swimming pool.
